list.name: Changes
list.comment: Fix incorrect variable in URL pattern for `sentence-interact-like` route in `danso/urls.py`.

option.name: myCustomStartScript

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_MARK_IGNORED_FILES_AS_EXCLUDED": "true", "DefaultHtmlFileTemplate": "HTML File", "Django Server.danso-backend.executor": "ConcurrencyExecutor", "Docker.Dockerfile builder.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-DatabaseConfigFileWatcher.found": "Database connection parameters found", "Notification.DoNotAsk-DatabaseConfigFileWatcher.found": "true", "RunOnceActivity.OpenDjangoStructureViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "django.template.preview.state": "SHOW_EDITOR_AND_PREVIEW", "git-widget-placeholder": "production", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "/Users/yuchan/dev/sunrin/danso-backend", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary: Default task
Set up initial project structure with `sentence` and `leaderboard` apps, REST API views, PostgreSQL configuration, and updated dependencies.
Add Dockerfile for containerized application setup and update IntelliJ workspace configuration
Update dependencies to use `psycopg2-binary` instead of `psycopg2` for improved compatibility and ease of installation
Add `djangorestframework` dependency to project configuration
Add `gunicorn` dependency for production and update configurations
Add `gunicorn` to general dependencies and configure `ALLOWED_HOSTS` for production
Update Dockerfile to optimize layer usage, add `uvicorn` dependencies for ASGI support, and configure production-ready server setup
Expose port `8000` in Dockerfile and configure `gunicorn` with `uvicorn` worker for ASGI support.
Add `whitenoise` for static file management, update settings, and adjust `.gitignore`.
Update `ALLOWED_HOSTS` configuration to include `.traefik.me` and standardize host entries.
Update Dockerfile to run `collectstatic` during build and refine production server setup.
Remove `leaderboard` app and implement `user` and `sentence` apps with enhanced models, views, templates, and migrations.
Add `level` field to `SentencePack`, implement new async views for `sentence` app, and refactor `user` authentication flow.
Introduce `realtime` app with initial setup, async player matching, and endpoint integration into URL configuration. Refactor quoting style in `sentence` app for consistency.
Update Dockerfile to switch from `gunicorn` to Django's `runserver` for development purposes. Comment out previous production command.
Remove `--insecure` flag from `runserver` command in Dockerfile to enhance development server configuration.
Update Dockerfile to replace `uv` command with `python3` for running the development server.
Remove `--noreload` flag from `runserver` command in Dockerfile to simplify development server behavior.
Update Dockerfile to bind `runserver` to all IPs by specifying `0.0.0.0:8000`.
Update Dockerfile to bind `runserver` to all IPs by specifying `0.0.0.0:8000`.
Fix leaderboard score update by casting `score` to `int` in async view.
Add `CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS` configuration to `settings.py`.
Refactor leaderboard logic to rename `total_score` to `score`, implement API documentation, and introduce `RealtimeRoomManager` for real-time game room management and matching.
Enhance `RealtimeRoomManager` with a new `leave_room` method, improve player matching logic, and refactor API documentation to dynamically generate endpoints.
Add player status management in `RealtimeRoomManager` to track progress, hearts, and last heartbeat. Refactor room initialization and improve handling for player state updates.
Remove unused `update_user_game_status` method in `manager.py` and update default heart value in `views.py` to 5. Refactor related code for improved clarity and maintainability.
Refactor authentication logic in `auth.py` to raise `AuthenticationFailed` for invalid login codes. Clean up formatting in `manager.py`, `urls.py`, and `views.py` for improved readability.
Refactor `views.py` to improve query readability and update leaderboard score handling logic for better clarity and messaging.
Refactor type hints in `models.py` and `views.py` for improved code clarity and maintainability
Remove ordering from SentencePack and Like models for improved query flexibility
Add verbose names for SentencePack and GameUser models, and create SentencePackLike model with unique constraints
Add verbose names for GameUser and SentenceLeaderboard models
Add async handling for SentencePack likes, update related views, and register SentencePackLike in admin.
Comment out `is_liked` field from SentencePack likes view.
Refactor views to improve async handling and readability; minor URL and formatting adjustments.
Add `image_id` field to SentencePack model and update views to include image URL generation
Add `image_file` field to SentencePack model, update associated templates, and add Pillow dependency.
Remove `image_file` and `image_id` fields from SentencePack, add `image_url` for S3 integration, implement R2 upload handling, and update related views, templates, and dependencies.
Add `history` and `now` fields to `GameUser` model, implement history management methods, and update views to handle SentencePack progression.
Fix URL pattern syntax for `sentence-interact-like` route in `danso/urls.py`.
Fix incorrect variable in URL pattern for `sentence-interact-like` route in `danso/urls.py`.

MESSAGE.value: Remove `--insecure` flag from `runserver` command in Dockerfile to enhance development server configuration.
Update Dockerfile to replace `uv` command with `python3` for running the development server.
Remove `--noreload` flag from `runserver` command in Dockerfile to simplify development server behavior.
Update Dockerfile to bind `runserver` to all IPs by specifying `0.0.0.0:8000`.
Fix leaderboard score update by casting `score` to `int` in async view.
Add `CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS` configuration to `settings.py`.
Refactor leaderboard logic to rename `total_score` to `score`, implement API documentation, and introduce `RealtimeRoomManager` for real-time game room management and matching.
Enhance `RealtimeRoomManager` with a new `leave_room` method, improve player matching logic, and refactor API documentation to dynamically generate endpoints.
Add player status management in `RealtimeRoomManager` to track progress, hearts, and last heartbeat. Refactor room initialization and improve handling for player state updates.
Remove unused `update_user_game_status` method in `manager.py` and update default heart value in `views.py` to 5. Refactor related code for improved clarity and maintainability.
Refactor authentication logic in `auth.py` to raise `AuthenticationFailed` for invalid login codes. Clean up formatting in `manager.py`, `urls.py`, and `views.py` for improved readability.
Refactor `views.py` to improve query readability and update leaderboard score handling logic for better clarity and messaging.
Refactor type hints in `models.py` and `views.py` for improved code clarity and maintainability
Remove ordering from SentencePack and Like models for improved query flexibility
Add verbose names for SentencePack and GameUser models, and create SentencePackLike model with unique constraints
Add verbose names for GameUser and SentenceLeaderboard models
Add async handling for SentencePack likes, update related views, and register SentencePackLike in admin.
Comment out `is_liked` field from SentencePack likes view.
Refactor views to improve async handling and readability; minor URL and formatting adjustments.
Add `image_id` field to SentencePack model and update views to include image URL generation
Add `image_file` field to SentencePack model, update associated templates, and add Pillow dependency.
Remove `image_file` and `image_id` fields from SentencePack, add `image_url` for S3 integration, implement R2 upload handling, and update related views, templates, and dependencies.
Add `history` and `now` fields to `GameUser` model, implement history management methods, and update views to handle SentencePack progression.
Fix URL pattern syntax for `sentence-interact-like` route in `danso/urls.py`.
